casebody.data:
UNITED STATES v. REISS & BRADY. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit February 1, 1906.) No. 94 (2,373, 2,549). Appeal from the Circuit Court of the United States for the Southern District of New York. For decision below, see 135 Fed. 248, reversing decisions of the Board of United States General Appraisers. Note G. A. 3.392 (T. D. 16,964). D. Frank Lloyd, Asst. U. S. Atty. Edward S. Hatch (J. Stuart Tompkins, of counsel), for importers.

Before LACOMBE, TOWNSEND, and COXE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decision of Circuit Court affirmed, on opinion of Judge Hazel.
